item.title: The first Post
item.description: The blank page So many possibilities, but so much anxiety. How do I make this interesting? Who will even read this? Have I picked the best theme? What should my other posts be? How do I go forward from here? Is this for me, or for you? Here’s a poem about it as well if you thought I wasn’t dramatic enough Beating the blank page / Alan j Wright A Battle-Cry for the Brave Young Writer.
